Articles.Content: There are plenty of parts for this like the science labs or some kerbal storage units, and there is already a IVA system in place. For a later version it would be nice if you could get up and walk (or float) around in your ship. This means that other than controling your ship's movement from the cockpit, you could send science data from the interior, look out a better window, or even repair your ship.

[MOD - Enhanced IVA / moving around in stations or rockets is on the official What Not To Suggest list, and as such, this thread is closed.

In the future, before posting a new suggestion, please consult the aforementioned thread, as it lists common suggestions that SQUAD is already aware about. Thanks!]
